attributes.action: Make it compulsory for minors to wear a cycle helmet when on public highways.
attributes.background: A simple yet effective way to protect our children while out on their cycles. If made law it would put an end to the bullying that so many children go through when wearing a helmet which results in no helmet and potentially fatal results.
